answers.answer: My first was 4 weeks early at 8 lbs 10 oz and 21 inch long  monster baby lol

My daughter was born in December 2011 I was 42 weeks. She weighed 8 lbs 3 oz. I was induced took 29 hours.I am 25 weeks now with a baby boy. Doc says I will probably need to be induced again because I had to be before and now I am "old" lol
My one and only was just born 1/28/15 weigh 7lb 15oz 20 inches long. I was induced due to being 41+5.
My first was born on her due date August 26 2012 she was 6 pounds 11.9 ounces 19 in long. My second was born nine days early January 3rd she was 6 pounds 13.4 ounced 19.5 in long

My first was 6lbs 10oz, 20.5 inches long and 12 days early. My second was 8lbs exactly, 21.5 inches long and 14 days early. Weird part is that I measured bigger with my first then I did for the second.
I went 10 days over on my last 3 babies..my first was 8lbs 6oz,second was 8lbs 10oz and third was 9lbs 2oz
My baby girl was born a day before i turned 39 weeks and was 5 lbs 15 oz
My first ( boy) was born on his due date August 26,2001 at 7lbs1 oz then my second( girl) I went a couple days over and she weighed 8lbs 3.4 oz
40w1d, 9 lbs even and 22.5" long, 21 hour med-free labor. Hoping labor with baby #2 will be a bit shorter, it was pretty tiring ;-)

First baby was induced at 40+5 labor for 22hrs! She was 8lbs 9oz 21in.Second baby was induced at exactly 38 weeks labor for 6hrs she was 6lbs 6oz 19in.Third baby was induced with pitocon to help contractions along. 39+4 labor no meds for 4 hrs she was 7lbs 4oz 19in.Fourth baby was induced at 40+6 labor for 8hrs no meds and He was 8lbs 3oz 21in.
Both my girls were 3 days past their due date..my first was 7lbs 12oz and my second was 8lbs 8oz

All my babies were born csection I had no choicey body wasnt good with labor and dialating in my first and I had to have repeat with the rest. My first was 39 weeks water broke than was given meds to induce labor. He was 7lb1oz 20in my 2nd boy was 38 weeks 7lbs13.5oz 19 1/2in. My 3rd was a girl 38 weeks 6lbs 5oz 20in. And my 4 the was a boy 38 1/2 weeks 6lbs 14oz 18 1/2 in. Number 5 was still born at 17 weeks and I am preggo with number 6 now.
I was 37 weeks when my little girl came all on her own time.  She was 7.6! Hoping my little guy decides to come about 2 weeks early too!

My first was born 5lbs 15 oz 19 in. She was vaginal and took 4 hrs to be born. Saturday at 4:33 5/26/2012. 2nd child was born 9/13/13 born c section due to being breech. Doctors tried to turn her no success.1:57 pm. My mom called the exact time she would be born. Im currently 6 weeks with 3rd child.  Hoping to have a vbac with this one. Loved giving birth vaginal.
My first was born on due date 8lbs 9oz, my second was born 11 days early and weighed 9lbs 14oz and my third was born 5 weeks early and weighed 6lbs 3oz

My first son was born at 39 wks and he weighed 8lbs 6ozs and was 21" long.  I'm expecting this second baby boy to be between 8-9lbs and hoping he comes before his due date as well.  We'll see as I'm currently 38wks today.
In was induced on 1/12/15 had my daughter on 1/14/15 and she was 6 PDS 13 Oz's and 19.5 inches long :)
My son was born on his due date 5th January 2015.. 7lb 15oz all natural med free labour

My 1st was a week early 7lb 5oz (natural ), second was 39+3w (induced due to preeclampsia and only a fingertip dilated) 8lb 15oz , (failure to progress needed c-section.) Baby #3 due April 4 hoping to vbac but was just diagnosed with gestational diabetes so we'll see where it goes from here.
My son was 40 weeks exactly. Born at 8lbs 8oz 21in. Had no idea he was that big. We will see with this one. Im having another boy.
I was indiced at 41 weeks 2 days. She weighed 7 pounds 13 ounces amd was 22 inches long
I had a scheduled c-section at 39 weeks and he was 7 lbs 5 ounces 21 in

First was a girl born at 37 weeks 5 days, she was 5 lbs 15oz and 18 in, second was a boy induced at 40 weeks 3 days, had him next day he was 8 lbs 2 oz and 20 1/2 in. Currently 38 weeks 6 days with a boy
1st was born @ 32 weeks 4lbs 3oz, 2nd was 37 weeks 7lbs 8oz, and 3rd was 36 weeks 6lbs 9oz. Who knows what this baby will be.

My 1st son induced 4 days over due 7lbs 2oz and my 2nd son was induced 2 wks early 7lbs 10oz and i am 26 wks with my 3rd son and i am sure ill be induced again because my cervix are tilted so i cant push out more then a 7lb baby
My first was 6 days early and weight 8 lb 13 oz

question: My first was born 41+2 weighing 7lbs 9oz. I was induced with him. I'm now 39 weeks woth a baby girl who they say was 5lbs 2 oz at 37 weeks, so she'll be small.  When and how was your baby born? And what did they weigh?
title: When was your baby born and how big?
